home-presentation-p: I am 29 years old and have always been passionate about mathematics and computer science. Curious and eager for knowledge, I have excellent interpersonal skills and can work well in a team. As I approach 30, I feel the need to transition to a field that has always been my own: programming. I invite you to enjoy browsing this portfolio.
home-work-card-content-dev: As a developer, I am captivated by the power and flexibility of high-level languages. With a strong background in low-level languages, I am eager for new projects.
home-work-card-content-math: My skills in mathematics are a valuable asset as a developer. They enable me to understand and solve complex problems with rigor and precision.
home-work-card-content-debug: I love debugging because it allows me to deeply understand how code works. Every bug is a challenge to solve, stimulating my curiosity and analytical mind.
home-work-card-content-com: Sharing and learning are great sources of satisfaction for me. I derive immense joy from sharing with others and value every opportunity to enrich my knowledge.
resume-formation-card-AMU-I: Bachelor's Degree in Mathematics and Computer Science
libgraphic-content: Development of libgraphic in C, a graphics library for creating 2D and 3D renders, animations, and visual interactions.
fdf-content: Wireframe viewer reading heightmaps and generating detailed 3D terrain representations, allowing interactive exploration.
raytracer-content: Basic raytracer creating realistic 3D images with shadows, reflections, and refractions by tracing light rays.
wolf3D-content: Replica of Wolfenstein using raycasting, with retro graphics and smooth gameplay, including immersive collision management.
bot-content: Creating Selenium bots to automate tasks on LinkedIn, Instagram, and Pronote, collecting data and managing repetitive actions.
axaunot-content: Manager for SMEs, similar to Axaunot, handling quotes, clients, inventory, tickets, and tasks. Integrates scanners for real-time stock tracking.
arina-content: Arina is a tactical game inspired by Final Fantasy Tactics, focusing on turn-based combat and team building.
dofus-content: Market analyzer for Dofus, collecting recipes, resources, and prices. Optimizes expenses and maximizes gains.
libc-content: Creating a custom version of libc, rewriting essential functions such as memory management and I/O operations.
ls-content: Reimplementation of the Unix/Linux 'ls' command, listing files and directories with various options. Demonstrates mastery of file systems in C.
minishell-content: Creating a mini shell to execute basic commands and manage processes and I/O manipulation.
corewar-content: Implementation of Corewar, a game where warrior programs battle in virtual memory by manipulating shared memory.
Lemin-content: Creating an ant farm management simulator, optimizing the path of ants through rooms and tunnels using graph algorithms.
ia-content: Creating basic AIs for Connect Four, mazes, and Fillit. Analyzes moves, finds the shortest path, and optimizes piece placement.
